item.title: 消息称 iPhone 17 Air 国行或无缘首发
item.guid: 消息称-iPhone-17-Air-国行或无缘首发
item.description:
Apple will hold its autumn new product launch event at midnight Beijing time on September 10 (this Wednesday), and more information about the iPhone 17 series new products is now surfacing. 苹果将在北京时间 9 月 10 日（本周三）凌晨举行秋季新品发布会，现在也有更多关于 iPhone 17 系列新品的更多信息浮出水面。

Previously, a blogger posted that China Unicom would provide business support for Apple's eSIM project, and the upcoming iPhone 17 Air is expected to support domestic eSIM services, but it is uncertain whether it will be the first to launch domestic mobile eSIM services. 此前曾有博主发文称，中国联通将要对苹果 eSIM 项目做业务支撑，同时即将发布的 iPhone 17 Air 有望支持国行 eSIM 服务，但无法确定是否能够首发国行手机 eSIM 服务。

On September 5, blogger "Kang" posted that the Chinese version of iPhone 17 Air will miss the first launch, "The ultra-thin model won't be first launched in mainland China, it's stuck. The good news is there's inventory, it should be fine once it lands." 9 月 5 日，博主「Kang」发文称 iPhone 17 Air 国行版将无缘首发， 「超薄大陆无首发，卡住了，好消息是有备货，等落地应该就行。 」

Over the past weekend, a poster detailing the iPhone 17 series launch from within South Korean carrier KT (Korea Telecom) was exposed: 在过去的周末，韩国运营商 KT（韩国电信）内部的一份 iPhone 17 系列发布细节海报则遭到曝光：

  • Apple has two plans for the iPhone 17 Air's battery life: a 2800-2900mAh high-energy-density battery, and the option of an original Apple battery clip. 苹果对 iPhone 17 Air 的续航有两手准备：2800-2900mAh 的高能量密度电池，并提供苹果原装电池背夹选择。
  • The iPhone 17 Pro series will have 12GB RAM and be equipped with a VC vapor chamber. iPhone 17 Pro 系列为 12GB RAM，配备 VC 均热板。
  • In terms of imaging capabilities, all four iPhone 17 series models are equipped with a 24-megapixel front camera; the 17 Pro/Max will feature a 48-megapixel triple rear camera, with the telephoto lens expected to offer 8x optical zoom; both 17 Pro series models support 8K resolution video recording. 影像能力上，iPhone 17 系列四款均配备 2400 万像素前置摄像头；17 Pro/Max 配备 4800 万像素后置三摄，长焦还有望提供 8 倍光学变焦；17 Pro 系列均支持 8K 分辨率视频拍摄。
  • The 17 Air features a 48-megapixel single camera with 4K recording; the 17 has a 48-megapixel main camera/12-megapixel wide-angle. 17 Air 搭载 4800 万像素单摄，4K 录制；17 4800 万主摄/1200 万广角。

And last night, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman published an article on time, revealing the latest progress on the Chinese version of Apple Intelligence: 而在昨晚，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 准时发文，透露了苹果智能（Apple Intelligence）国行版的最新进展：

    Due to internal and external issues, Apple was unable to launch the Chinese version of Apple Intelligence in the middle of the year as planned, but Apple is still committed to achieving this goal.

    Alibaba will continue to serve as the foundational model provider, powering Apple Intelligence services in mainland China; Baidu AI will also support Siri and visual intelligence, playing a role equivalent to OpenAI in non-Chinese versions.

    Apple's plan is to launch by the end of this year, implemented with the iOS 26.1 or iOS 26.2 update, but the possibility of delay remains high, as Apple's team is actively testing these features with Chinese employees.

Gurman also pointed out that Apple is concerned that iPhones without AI features will lose competitiveness against domestic brand phones, and therefore is still working hard to launch Apple Intelligence in China, even considering it a key selling point for the iPhone 17. Gurman 还指出， 苹果担心，没有 AI 功能的 iPhone 会在国产品牌手机面前失去竞争力，因此仍然努力推出国行 Apple 智能，甚至将其视为 iPhone 17 的一个关键卖点。

Gurman also made predictions about the iPhone Air model. He believes that the iPhone 17 Air will lay the foundation for future model development, much like the original MacBook Air, and similar thin and light models will become the norm in the future, with the iPhone 17 Air being more like a "preview" of the future. Gurman 还对 iPhone Air 机型进行了预测判断。其认为 iPhone 17 Air 将会像初代 MacBook Air 奠定后续的机型发展，并且类似的轻薄机型在未来将会成为常态， 而 iPhone 17 Air 更像是未来的「预告」。

item.title: 威马汽车宣布本月复产
item.guid: 威马汽车宣布本月复产
item.description:
On September 6, Weltmeister Motor released the "White Paper to Suppliers," outlining some of its plans for resuming work and production. 9 月 6 日，威马汽车发布《致供应商白皮书》，并提到了威马汽车后续复工复产的部分计划。

The white paper shows that four Weltmeister-affiliated companies, including Weltmeister Motor Technology Group Co., Ltd., have been taken over by Shenzhen Xiangfei Automobile Sales Co., Ltd. according to the restructuring plan approved by a court ruling on April 3, 2025, with the latter becoming the restructuring investor and new shareholder of the four Weltmeister companies. 白皮书显示，威马汽车科技集团有限公司等四家威马系公司，已根据 2025 年 4 月 3 日法院裁定批准的重整计划，由深圳翔飞汽车销售有限公司接管，后者成为威马四公司的重整投资人和新股东。

At the same time, Weltmeister also announced its "New Weltmeister Plan": 同时，威马还公布了「新威马规划」：

    Revitalization Phase (2025-2026): Resumption of EX5/E.5 model production in September 2025, ensuring annual production and sales of 10,000 units, striving for 20,000 units; simultaneously, breaking into overseas markets by setting up a KD factory in Thailand to expand into Southeast Asian and Middle Eastern markets; mass production of 100,000 units in 2026.

    Development Phase (2027-2028): Annual sales jump from 250,000 to 400,000 units, mass production of advanced assisted driving models, AI empowerment across the entire chain of R&D, production, and marketing, and initiation of IPO preparations.

    Leapfrog Phase (2029-2030): Production target of 1 million units and revenue of 120 billion by 2030, building a smart mobility ecosystem, and becoming a new industry benchmark.

Weltmeister also revealed that it has a comprehensive and rapidly expanding product portfolio, covering pure electric and extended-range technical routes, and plans to launch more than 10 new products to the market in the next 5 years, adapting to the diverse needs of the global market. 威马还透露，其拥有全面且快速扩大的产品组合，涵盖了纯电动、增程式技术路线， 计划未来 5 年向市场推出 10 款以上的新产品，适配全球市场多样化需求。

Specifically, the vehicle lineup includes refreshed EX5, E.5, etc., with products covering A00, A0, A, B, and C-segment sedans, SUVs, MPVs, crossovers, and other models, differentiated by various brand positioning. 具体来看，车型图谱包括焕新 EX5、E.5 等，产品涵盖 A00 级、A0 级、A 级、B 级、C 级的轿车、SUV、MPV、跨界车等车型，通过不同品牌差异化定位。

The white paper indicates that the resumption of work and production for New Weltmeister Motors has received strong support from the Shanghai Municipal Government and relevant departments, as well as the Wenzhou Municipal Government and relevant departments, providing a stable and favorable environment for the project. 白皮书显示，新威马汽车的复工复产得到上海市政府及相关部门、温州市政府及相关部门的大力支持，为项目提供了稳定和有利的环境。

According to a contact person cited by Blue Whale News from the white paper, they responded that Weltmeister's Wenzhou base has already resumed production, and some vehicles have rolled off the line and are now being sold , stating, "More than a dozen cars have rolled off the line, mainly for market penetration." They also revealed that there will be new sales outlets later, and a press conference will be held then. As for the specific timing, they admitted that it involves the company's core confidential marketing strategy and could not be disclosed. 另据蓝鲸新闻援引白皮书显示的沟通联系人，其回应称， 目前威马温州基地已开始复产，部分车辆已下线并开始在卖了 ，「已下线十几台车了，主要用于铺市场。」其并透露，后续会有新的销售门店，届时也会开新闻发布会。至于具体何时，其坦言，这涉及公司核心机密的营销策略，不便透露。

The aforementioned contact person pointed out that the factory currently has over 400 people, including basic workers, team leaders, and workshop directors, operating according to a normal organizational structure. They revealed that former Weltmeister employees had also been notified (e.g., when preparations would start), with efforts to "recall" old employees while also actively recruiting. 前述联系人指出，目前工厂已有 400 多人，涵盖基础工人、班组长、车间主任等，按照正常体系机构在进行。其透露，此前也有向前威马员工发了通知（如准备什么时候启动等），一边「召回」老员工，一边也在大力招聘。

A former Weltmeister employee stated that two months ago, a former leader asked if they wanted to return, saying, "If you want to come back, you generally can, and we'll renegotiate salaries." However, people from their original department had no plans to return, citing, "It's not stable to go back." 有前威马员工表示，两个月前曾被前领导问要不要回去，「想回一般都可以回去，会重新谈工资。」但其原来部门的人没有打算回去的，「回去也不稳定。」

item.title: 马斯克：特斯拉将推出史诗级芯片
item.guid: 马斯克：特斯拉将推出史诗级芯片
item.description:
Yesterday, Elon Musk posted an update on the latest progress of Tesla's self-developed chip — the "AI Series Smart Driving Chip." In his post, he mentioned that the Tesla AI5 chip design team recently conducted a very successful review, even calling AI5 "an epic chip." 昨日，马斯克发文透露了特斯拉自研芯片 ——「AI 系列智驾芯片」的最新进展。其在文中提到，特斯拉 AI5 芯片设计团队近期进行了一次非常成功的评审， 甚至直呼 AI5 是「一款史诗级的芯片」。

At the same time, Musk further hyped the preview of AI6: "The upcoming AI6 is expected to be the best AI chip to date." 同时马斯克也把 AI6 的预告继续推高： 「即将推出的 AI6 有望成为迄今为止最好的 AI 芯片。」

In the comments section, Musk continued to reveal more about AI5's performance: the chip will be the best inference chip for models with fewer than 250B parameters, achieving lower cost and higher performance (power output). He also emphasized, "AI6 will take AI5's performance to another level." 评论区马斯克也继续爆出更多 AI5 的表现：该芯片将成为参数量低于 250B 的模型的最佳推理芯片，并做到成本低、性能（释放功率）更高。其还强调，「AI6 将把 AI5 的表现拉高到另一层次。」

In August, according to Bloomberg and Reuters, Tesla disbanded its Dojo supercomputer team and reallocated some employees to other departments. 8 月，据彭博社及路透社消息，特斯拉解散了其 Dojo 超级计算机团队，并将部分员工重新分配到其他部门。

Reportedly, since its inception, the Dojo project has been considered a core component of Tesla's autonomous driving technology. This supercomputer is designed to provide powerful computing power for Tesla's neural network training, supporting the enhancement of its autonomous driving capabilities. 据报道，Dojo 项目自启动以来，一直被视为特斯拉自动驾驶技术的核心组成部分。该超级计算机旨在为特斯拉的神经网络训练提供强大算力，以支持其自主驾驶功能的提升。

Musk stated in the article that moving from a "two-chip architecture" approach to one, "means all of our Silicon Valley talent is focused on building an incredible chip." Finally, Musk did not forget to encourage everyone to join Tesla's "Silicon Valley team." 文中马斯克表示，从「两个芯片架构」的路线转向一个， 「这意味着我们所有的硅谷人才都专注于打造一款令人难以置信的芯片。」 最后，马斯克还不忘带动大家加入特斯拉的「硅谷团队」。

item.title: 宝马 CFO：凭借新纯电车型，有望实现在华市场回暖
item.guid: 宝马-CFO：凭借新纯电车型，有望实现在华市场回暖
item.description:
According to Reuters, BMW CFO Walter Mertl stated in an interview that the company is confident in its largest market, China, and believes that with the new all-electric strategic series "Neue Klasse," the company can return to a growth trajectory. 据路透社报道，宝马首席财务官 Walter Mertl 接受采访时表示，公司对自身最大的市场 —— 中国充满信心，并相信凭借全新的纯电战略系列「Neue Klasse」，公司能够重回增长的轨道。

It is reported that the first production model of the Neue Klasse series, the new iX3, was recently officially unveiled. Compared to the previously released Vision Neue Klasse X concept car, the production version of the iX3 largely retains the original design philosophy. In the fields of AI and intelligence, it integrates Chinese capabilities from Alibaba, DeepSeek, Huawei, Momenta, and others. 据悉，Neue Klasse 系列首款量产车型 —— 全新 iX3 近期正式亮相发布。和此前发布的 Vision Neue Klasse X 概念车相比对，量产版的 iX3 在很大程度上保留了原来的设计理念。并在 AI、智能领域上，集成了阿里巴巴、DeepSeek、华为、Momenta 等中国能力。

Walter Mertl stated that the new iX3 is highly competitive, and as the "Neue Klasse" strategy becomes increasingly popular, "we will once again see growth in the Chinese market." Walter Mertl 表示，全新 iX3 具有极强的竞争力，并随着「Neue Klasse」战略日益普及， 「我们将再次在中国市场看到增长。」

It is reported that the new iX3 will be launched in China in the summer of 2026. Notably, Walter Mertl revealed that the new car's battery cost will be 40%-50% lower than existing BMW models, which is a key factor in helping BMW increase profitability. 据悉，全新 iX3 将于 2026 年夏季在中国推出。值得一提的是，Walter Mertl 透露，新车的电池成本相比现有的宝马车型降低 40%-50%，而这也是帮助宝马提升盈利的关键因素。

The report indicates that in the first half of 2025, BMW's sales in China decreased by 15.5%. 报道指出，2025 年上半年，宝马在华销量下降 15.5%。

item.title: OpenAI 重组模型团队：让 ChatGPT 变得有性格
item.guid: OpenAI-重组模型团队：让-ChatGPT-变得有性格
item.description:
According to a recent TechCrunch report, OpenAI is reorganizing its model behavior team, aiming to give ChatGPT more "personality." 据 TechCrunch 日前报道，OpenAI 正在重组其模型行为团队，旨在让 ChatGPT 变得更有「性格（个性）」。

It is reported that OpenAI's model behavior team is a small but influential group responsible for shaping how AI models interact with humans. The report revealed that OpenAI Chief Research Officer Mark Chen mentioned in an internal memo in August that the model behavior team consists of 14 research members, and this group will also join the post-training team. 据悉，OpenAI 的模型行为团队是一个规模虽小但影响重要的小组，负责塑造 AI 模型与人类互动的方式。报道透露，OpenAI 首席研究官 Mark Chen 曾在 8 月的一份内部备忘录中提到，模型行为团队由 14 名研究成员组成，该小组还将加入后训练团队。

Specifically, the model behavior team will focus on shaping the personality of OpenAI's models and reducing "flattery" — where AI models merely agree with and reinforce user beliefs (even if unhealthy) instead of providing a balanced response. Notably, OpenAI also plans to address political bias in model answers. 具体来看， 模型行为团队将会着力于塑造 OpenAI 旗下模型的个性，并且减少「拍马屁」的情况 —— AI 模型仅仅同意并强化用户的信念（即便不健康），而不是提供一个平衡的回应。比较突出的是，OpenAI 还打算处理模型回答中的政治偏见。

Mark Chen also mentioned in the letter that it is time to more closely integrate the work of OpenAI's model behavior team with core model development. The report analyzes that OpenAI has indicated that the "personality" of AI models will be a key factor in future technological evolution. Mark Chen 还在信中提到，现在是时候将 OpenAI 模型行为团队的工作与核心模型开发更紧密地结合起来。报道分析，OpenAI 表明了 AI 模型的「个性」将会是未来技术演变的一个关键因素。

This year, when OpenAI released the GPT-5 model, users complained that "the flattery rate decreased, but the model became cold." Subsequently, OpenAI released a "warmer, friendlier" version, but without increasing the chances of "flattery." 👋🐴💨 今年，OpenAI 在发布 GPT-5 模型时，就曾遭到用户吐槽「奉承率降低，但是模型变冷漠了」。后续 OpenAI 则发布了一个「更温暖、友好」的版本，但同时不增加「拍马屁」的几率。👋🐴💨

Separately, Bloomberg, citing The Information, reported that OpenAI informed investors that it expects its spending to reach $115 billion by 2029, about $80 billion higher than previously anticipated , but did not provide details on when and how shareholders were informed. 另据彭博社援引 The Information 消息，OpenAI 告知投资者， 其预计到 2029 年的支出将会达到 1150 亿美元，比先前预期高出约 800 亿美元 ，但未提供关于股东何时以及如何被告知的细节。

According to the report, OpenAI is developing its own data center server chips and facilities to advance related technologies, aiming to control cloud server leasing costs. 据报告称，OpenAI 正在开发自己的数据中心服务器芯片和设施，以推动相关技术发展，旨在控制云服务器租赁费用。

Another factor increasing capital demand is computing costs — OpenAI expects to spend over $150 billion in this area from 2025 to 2030. 另一个增加对资本需求的因素是计算成本 —— OpenAI 预计从 2025 年到 2030 年，将在这个方面支出超过 1500 亿美元。

item.title: 小米高管回应小米手机测试 30 万小时
item.guid: 小米高管回应小米手机测试-30-万小时
item.description:
Recently, blogger "Xiaoniu Deke" posted an article criticizing content related to "focused attacks on 'Xiaomi's 300,000-hour phone test'." Subsequently, Wang Hua, General Manager of Xiaomi PR, reposted the content and responded. 日前，博主「小牛德克」发文批评了「集火攻击‘小米 30 万小时手机测试’」的相关内容。随后小米公关总经理王化转发内容并回应。

Wang Hua stated that the so-called 300,000-hour test is itself an industry standard term , referring to the cumulative total duration of several months of testing a single phone using thousands of test units simultaneously to simulate usage scenarios. 王化称， 所谓 30 万小时测试，本身就是行业标准说法 ，是一款手机同时用几千台测试机，模拟使用场景测试了几个月的累计总时长。

He also added: "Today's internet allows many people to access information beyond their knowledge base, and this specialized knowledge is not covered by nine years of compulsory education, so I kindly believe that not understanding it is also understandable." 其还表示： 「现在的互联网让很多人能接触到自己知识面以外的信息，而这些专业知识是九年义务教育覆盖不了的，所以我善意的认为不懂也可以理解吧。」

item.title: nano banana 上线 Gemini
item.description:
We have observed that Google's recently popular Gemini image generator, "Gemini 2.5 Flash Image" (codename nano banana), has recently landed on Gemini. 据我们观察发现，近期大火的 Google Gemini 图像生成器「Gemini 2.5 Flash Image」（代号 nano banana）日前已登陆 Gemini。

After users open Gemini, the top of the homepage will display a prompt: '🍌 New feature! Try image editing to experience our most powerful image model nano banana,' and a '🍌 Image' button will also be added to the input bar at the bottom. 用户打开 Gemini 后，首页顶部将提示「🍌 新功能！试用图像编辑功能，体验我们最强大的图像模型 nano banana」，而底部输入栏的按键也新增了一枚「🍌 图像」的按钮。

nano banana was released at the end of August, possessing various powerful capabilities such as maintaining character consistency, utilizing Gemini's real-world knowledge, multi-image fusion, and prompt-based image editing. Shortly after its release, the 'Everything can be a figurine' images generated by nano banana swept across the internet, becoming a major hot topic. nano banana 于 8 月底发布，拥有保持角色的一致性、利用 Gemini 的现实世界知识、多幅图像融合、基于提示的图片编辑等各类强大能力。发布不久后，由 nano banana 生成的「万物皆可手办」图片席卷全网，成为一大热门话题。

item.title: 💡 柯洁：在被 AI 完全取代前，多提升认知
item.guid: 💡-柯洁：在被-AI-完全取代前，多提升认知
item.description:
Recently, Ke Jie, the youngest 'eight-time champion' in Go history, was a guest on 'Beyond the Heatwave,' engaging in a discussion with host Lu Yu covering various aspects such as personal interests and development. 近日，围棋史上最年轻的「八冠王」柯洁做客《热浪之外》，与主持人鲁豫进行了一次基于个人兴趣、发展等各方面的交流。

When the two discussed AI and Go matches, Lu Yu asked Ke Jie: 'Will you play AI again?' Ke Jie replied, 'Do you want to see me get crushed? If the audience likes it, I'll play, it's just putting what I usually do in front of the public, playing a hundred games and losing a hundred games.' Ke Jie stated, 'Currently, playing Go is very convenient; you just play against AI on a computer.' 两人在聊到 AI 与棋局的时候，鲁豫向柯洁提问：「是否会再战 AI？」柯洁则表示「想看我被虐吗？如果观众喜欢看我就下，只不过是把平常自己做的事情放在公众面前，下一百盘输一百盘。」柯洁表示， 目前下棋很方便，只要在电脑上和 AI 下。

Lu Yu then asked, 'During the game, won't AI collect your data?' Ke Jie jokingly replied, 'The input player data is worthless to AI because the skill level is too low; putting it in would only pollute the database.' 紧接着鲁豫问到「下棋过程中，AI 难道不会去搜集你的数据信息吗？」而柯洁则调侃表示 「输入的棋手数据对 AI 毫无价值，因为水平太低，输进去反而污染了数据库。」

Facing AI's technological reform of Go, Ke Jie confronted it calmly. He mentioned, 'What should be done when AI completely replaces an industry?' 'Improve cognition; don't wait until AI completely takes over to make changes.' At the same time, Ke Jie also emphasized, 'There's no need to compete with AI; focus on comparing with humans.' 面对 AI 对围棋的技术改革，柯洁则坦然面对。他提到， 「AI 完全取代一个行业时该怎么办？」「提升认知，不能等到 AI 完全取代的时候做出改变。」同时柯洁也强调，不用跟 AI 竞争，做好与人类的对比。

'How to face the surging trend of AI?' 'Learn more, so you know what to do and how to understand the world.'

item.title: 小米 16 确认发布提档，真机曝光
item.guid: 小米-16-确认发布提档，真机曝光
item.description:
Recently, blogger 'i Ice Universe' posted that Xiaomi 16 will be released earlier than in previous years (Xiaomi 15 and 14 were released in October 2024/2023, respectively). Subsequently, Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, reposted the relevant content and confirmed, 'It's coming soon.' 近日，博主「i 冰宇宙」发文称，小米 16 将会比往年更早发布（小米 15、14 分别于 2024/2023 年 10 月发布），随后小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰转发相关内容并确认表示「快了」。

At the same time, Xiaomi recently launched its 'Annual Flagship Offline Blind Pre-order' event. 同时，小米也在近期开启了「年度旗舰线下盲约」活动。

'i Ice Universe' also recently released a front photo of a mysterious new phone, stating that it 'features the brand's unprecedented large R-angle and narrow bezels.' Subsequently, a front image of a mysterious new phone equipped with the Xiaomi HyperOS 3 system lock screen interface was released. In response, many sources predict that this new phone might be the Xiaomi 16. 「i 冰宇宙」还在日前发布了一张神秘新机的正面照片，并表示「拥有该品牌前所未有的大 R 角、窄边框」，并随后放出了一张配备小米澎湃 OS 3 系统锁屏界面的神秘新机正面图。对此，不少消息预测该新机或为小米 16。

'i Ice Universe' also revealed that the Xiaomi 16 will significantly reduce the size of the front punch-hole, further enhancing its front appearance. 「i 冰宇宙」还透露，小米 16 将明显缩小正面打孔，进一步提高正面颜值。

Additionally, recent images show Xu Fei, Vice President of Xiaomi Group, appearing with a new phone model in hand. Judging from the device in Xu Fei's hand, the new phone will feature a horizontally integrated rear camera module with two larger rear camera units. Combining previous information, it appears that some models in the Xiaomi 16 series might be equipped with a secondary rear screen. 另外，近日有图片显示，小米集团副总裁许斐手持了一款全新机型现身。从许斐手上的机器来看，新机将拥有横向贯穿式后置相机模组，拥有两枚较大的后摄单元。而综合此前信息显示，小米 16 系列或有机型将配备后置副屏。

item.title: 带摄像头的 AirPods 或明年才来
item.guid: 带摄像头的-AirPods-或明年才来
item.description:
Recently, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo posted again, reiterating that a 'major update' version of AirPods, featuring an infrared camera and more significant hardware upgrades, will be launched next year. 日前，分析师郭明錤发文再次强调，配备红外摄像头、硬件升级更明显的「大更新」版 AirPods 将会在明年推出。

According to the latest news, the new AirPods Pro (possibly AirPods Pro 3) will be unveiled at Apple's autumn new product launch event this week. The new AirPods Pro will be equipped with two health sensors — a heart rate sensor and a body temperature sensor; however, the highly anticipated real-time translation feature will not be launched alongside the hardware debut. 据悉，以最新消息显示，新款 AirPods Pro（或为 AirPods Pro 3）将会在本周的苹果秋季新品发布会亮相。新款 AirPods Pro 将会配备两个健康传感器 —— 心率传感器和体温传感器；而备受期待的实时翻译功能无法跟随硬件首发而一同推出。

According to previous reports, camera-equipped AirPods will act as the 'eyes' for Apple Intelligence and Siri, becoming a new AI entry point. Ming-Chi Kuo previously stated that the image data captured by these visual sensors would be transmitted to other devices like iPhones or smart glasses, allowing users to activate visual intelligence features without taking out their phones. 而据此前消息，带摄像头版的 AirPods 将充当 Apple 智能和 Siri 的「眼睛」，成为新的 AI 入口。郭明錤曾表示，这些视觉传感器捕捉到的图像数据会传输到 iPhone 或智能眼镜等其他设备，让用户无需拿出手机也能启动视觉智能功能。

Additionally, the camera can help AirPods better perceive the user's physical space, providing a more realistic surround sound effect. 另外，摄像头也能帮助 AirPods 更好地感知用户所在的物理空间，提供更加真实的环绕立体声效果。

item.title: 五菱×华为首款合作车型曝光
item.guid: 五菱×华为首款合作车型曝光
item.description:
On September 6, SAIC-GM-Wuling Automobile Co., Ltd. and Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. held a signing ceremony in Liuzhou for the deepening cooperation on Baojun's "Three Intelligences," fully upgrading their strategic partnership. 9 月 6 日，上汽通用五菱汽车股份有限公司与华为技术有限公司在柳州举行宝骏「三智」深化合作签约仪式，全面升级战略合作伙伴关系。

It is reported that the two sides will deepen cooperation in three areas: assisted driving, intelligent cockpit, and intelligent manufacturing , jointly promoting the high-quality development of the automotive industry towards intelligence and connectivity. At the ceremony, the first model resulting from their deepened cooperation, the Baojun Huajing S, was unveiled for the first time. 据悉， 双方将在辅助驾驶、智能座舱、智能制造三方面深化合作 ，共同推动汽车产业智能、网联化高质量发展。仪式上，双方深化合作的首款车型——宝骏华境 S 首次曝光。

Specifically, the Baojun Huajing S will be positioned as a "flagship large six-seater SUV." The new car will come standard with Huawei Qiankun Intelligent Driving HUAWEI ADS 4, Hongmeng Cockpit HarmonySpace 5, and Qiankun Vehicle Cloud HUAWEI IVCS, and will be among the first to feature Huawei's in-cabin laser vision (Limera). 具体来看，宝骏华境 S 将定位「旗舰大六座 SUV」，新车全系标配华为乾崑智驾 HUAWEI ADS 4 、鸿蒙座舱 HarmonySpace 5、乾崑车云 HUAWEI IVCS，并首批搭载华为舱内激光视觉（Limera）。

In terms of safety, the Baojun Huajing S adheres to five major safety concepts: "intelligent safety, structural safety, battery safety, material safety, and all-time safety." It features the all-dimensional anti-collision system CAS 4.0, a design exceeding the C-NCAP 2024 five-star safety standard, and the Shenlian battery, which has cumulatively protected the battery safety of 3 million users. 在安全方面，宝骏华境 S 秉承「智能安全、结构安全、电池安全、材料安全、全时安全」五大安全理念，拥有全维防碰撞系统 CAS 4.0、超 C-NCAP 2024 版五星安全标准设计，以及累计守护 300 万用户电池安全的神炼电池。

item.title: 央视起底多地机械车位遭闲置
item.guid: 央视起底多地机械车位遭闲置
item.description:
Image source: Beijing Evening News

According to a recent report by CCTV Finance, the multi-story mechanical parking spaces, once intended to "make full use of space and solve the problem of limited parking," have now become idle "empty spaces" that everyone complains about. 据央视财经日前报道，曾经为了「充分利用空间，解决停车位少」的立体机械停车位，如今变成了人人抱怨的闲置「空位」。

The report points out that in large cities, the scarcity of parking spaces has always been a difficult problem for municipalities. To make full use of space, many shopping malls and residential communities have used mechanical parking spaces, or multi-story parking spaces, to alleviate parking difficulties. However, according to reports, many car owners complain about parking difficulties, while a large number of mechanical parking spaces are effectively useless and left idle. 报道指出，大城市里，车位少一直是市政面临的一道难题。为了充分利用空间，不少商场和小区都通过机械车位、也就是立体车位来调节停车难。而据报道，不少车主抱怨停车难，同时也有大量的机械车位形同虚设，被闲置起来。

According to the investigation, common mechanical parking spaces can accommodate vehicles up to 4.8 meters long, 1.9 meters wide, and weighing up to 2 tons. However, many newly launched car models currently have lengths generally exceeding 4.8-5 meters, widths close to 2 meters, and weights over 2 tons , making them unable to be parked in mechanical parking spaces. 据调查， 常见的机械车位可以停放长 4.8 米、宽 1.9 米、重量 2 吨以内的车辆。 然而目前新上市的不少车型， 车长普遍在 4.8-5 米以上，宽度接近 2 米，重量在 2 吨以上 ，无法停放在机械车位里。

The report also points out that "not knowing how to use them" is the primary challenge faced by most mechanical parking spaces. Most garage staff have not received operational training for mechanical parking spaces, nor do they have special operation certificates; many security guards are also afraid of equipment malfunctions or damaging vehicles due to their own operational errors, and thus are unwilling to use them. 报道还指出，「不会用」是大部分机械车位面临的首要难题。大部分车库工作人员既没有接受过机械车位的操作培训，也没有特种作业操作证；不少保安也害怕设备出现故障或自己操作失误损坏了车辆，因此不愿使用。

Furthermore, according to "Chaping X.PIN" citing the "2024 White Paper on China's Parking Industry Development," the sales volume of mechanical parking equipment and the number of newly added parking spaces in China have experienced a continuous decline for 4 years since 2020, falling to less than half of their peak period. 另据「差评 X.PIN」援引《2024 年中国停车行业发展白皮书》，机械式停车设备在国内的销售额和每年新增的泊位数，已经从 2020 年开始经历了连续 4 年的下滑，跌到了只有巅峰时期的一半不到。

The news indicates that in the past four to five years, the appeal of multi-story parking spaces, devices found in shopping malls and residential communities across the country, is rapidly disappearing for developers. 消息指出， 最近这四五年，立体车位这个遍布全国大小商场和小区的装置，对开发商们的吸引力正在快速消失。

item.title: 多方回应骑手配送鳄鱼半路活了
item.guid: 多方回应骑手配送鳄鱼半路活了
item.description:
According to DV Live news, Mr. Guan, a delivery rider in Guangzhou, recently stated that on September 4, he received an order to "deliver a crocodile," and this crocodile was dead. However, during delivery, the crocodile suddenly began to struggle, startling Mr. Guan, who then called the police and contacted the seller. 据 DV 现场消息，日前广州的跑腿骑手关先生称，9 月 4 日，他接到一个「送鳄鱼」的订单，而且这条鳄鱼是死的。但在送货途中鳄鱼突然开始挣扎，关先生被吓了一跳，随后报警处理并联系卖家。

The owner of the involved crocodile wholesale department responded, stating that he never said the crocodile was dead. Usually, when they ship, they only tie the crocodile's mouth with a rope, pack single crocodiles in nylon bags, and use wooden crates for multiple ones. They deliver almost daily via courier and have never had any problems. 涉事鳄鱼批发部老板回应称，自己从未说过鳄鱼是死的，一般他们发货都只是用绳子绑住鳄鱼嘴巴，单条用尼龙袋包装，多条才用木箱，几乎每天都会通过跑腿配送，从未出过问题。

In response to this incident, the Lalamove platform stated that the user did not specify the cargo type when placing the order. After the rider accepted the order and discovered the cargo was a crocodile, he did not cancel the order but insisted on transporting it, meaning both parties violated platform rules. 针对此事，货拉拉平台回应称，该订单用户下单时并无备注货物类型，骑手接单后发现货物为鳄鱼，并没有取消订单，仍坚持运输， 双方均违反平台规则。

The platform stated that the losses incurred by the rider during personal transportation have been settled with the merchant through negotiation and compensation. The platform has educated both the user and the rider, and will strengthen educational campaigns on prohibiting the illegal transportation of goods in the future. 平台表示， 目前骑手个人运输过程中造成的损失已与商家达成协商赔偿，平台已对用户和骑手进行教育，后续也会加强对禁止违规运输货物的教育宣传。

item.title: 我国成为全球最大水果生产/消费国
item.guid: 我国成为全球最大水果生产/消费国
item.description:
CCTV Finance recently reported that, according to data, China is the world's largest fruit producer and consumer, with its fruit output accounting for approximately one-third of the global total. 央视财经日前报道，据数据显示，我国是全球最大的水果生产国和消费国，水果产量占到了全球的约三分之一。

The report points out that in the first half of this year, China's total fruit exports reached 2.1578 million tons, a year-on-year increase of 5.69%, rewriting the global "foodie" fruit plate structure with a trend of "both volume and price rising." 报道指出，今年上半年， 中国水果出口总量 215.78 万吨、同比增长 5.69%，正以「量价齐升」的态势，改写了全球「吃货」的果盘结构。

Among them, pomelos from Pinghe County, Zhangzhou, Fujian, have become a best-selling fruit in the market. In recent years, Pinghe pomelos have successfully entered overseas markets, exported to multiple countries and regions such such as the EU, North America, and the Middle East. 其中，福建漳州平和县盛产的蜜柚成为了市场畅销水果。近年来，平和蜜柚成功进入海外市场，远销欧盟、北美洲、中东等多个国家和地区。

The report states that recently, a batch of Pinghe pomelos crossed the ocean and landed in the New Zealand market for the first time. In Indonesia, China has been its largest imported fruit supplier for many consecutive years. 报道称，近日，一批平和蜜柚跨越重洋，首次登陆新西兰市场。在印度尼西亚，中国连续多年成为其第一大进口水果供应国。

Relevant individuals stated that China's apple exports to Indonesia account for 90% of Indonesia's imports of similar products, which is sufficient to illustrate the high export penetration rate of Chinese fruits in the Indonesian market. Today, continuous technological progress has given delicacies that were once difficult to travel far due to geographical isolation the confidence to precisely connect with global markets. 相关人士表示，中国对印尼出口的苹果，占印尼同类产品进口量的 90%，足以说明中国水果在印尼市场的出口渗透率有多高。如今，科技的持续进步，让曾经因地理隔绝而难以远行的美味，如今有了精准对接全球市场的底气。

item.title: 辛芷蕾成为本届威尼斯影后
item.guid: 辛芷蕾成为本届威尼斯影后
item.description:
Recently, actress Xin Zhilei won Best Actress at the 82nd Venice Film Festival for her film 'Sun Hung in the Sky'. 日前，演员辛芷蕾凭借电影《日掛中天》拿下第 82 届威尼斯电影节最佳女演员。

According to Watchmen Hollywood, Xin Zhilei gave a personal speech when accepting the award, stating that she felt like she was dreaming. "Speaking of dreams, over ten years ago when I first entered the industry, I boasted, which was also a dream. I said that one day I would stand on a world-class stage and become an international superstar. But at that time, I was subjected to a lot of ridicule. Today, I am finally standing here. " 据守望好莱坞报道，辛芷蕾在领奖时发表了个人感言，其表示自己就像在做梦一样。「说到做梦，十几年前我刚入行的时候，吹过一个牛，也算是一个梦想。 我说有一天我要站在世界级舞台上，成为国际巨星。但是呢，那时候我遭受到了很多嘲笑。今天我终于站在这儿了。 」

She also said in her speech, "I want to say to all girls: as long as you have a dream, dare to think, dare to do, what if it comes true one day, just like me?" 其还在发言时表示，「我想对所有女孩说一声：只要有梦想，就大胆去想，大胆去做，万一哪天就实现了呢，像我一样。」

It is reported that the film 'Sun Hung in the Sky', directed by Cai Shangjun and starring Xin Zhilei and Zhang Songwen, tells the story of an accident involving two trapped individuals. After seven years of struggle, former lovers unexpectedly reunite. Hidden pasts are revealed, and under the torrent of fate, they once again embark on a story of extreme love and hate, involving human nature and morality, sacrifice and repayment. The film was nominated for the main competition unit of the 82nd Venice International Film Festival. 据悉，电影《日掛中天》由蔡尚君执导，辛芷蕾、张颂文领衔主演，该片讲述一桩意外，被困住的两人。蹉跎七年，昔日恋人意外重逢。隐秘的过往被揭开，人性和道德、牺牲与偿还，宿命洪流下的他们再度开启极致爱恨拉扯的故事。影片入围第 82 届威尼斯国际电影节主竞赛单元。

item.title: 《哆啦 A 梦：新·大雄的海底鬼岩城》预告公布
item.guid: 《哆啦-A-梦：新·大雄的海底鬼岩城》预告公布
item.description:
Recently, the special report for the theatrical anime film 'Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure in the Undersea Castle' was officially released. It is reported that this film is a new version of the 1983 'Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Undersea Castle' and is scheduled for release in 2026. 日前，剧场版动画《哆啦 A 梦：新・大雄的海底鬼岩城》特报正式公布。据悉，本片是 1983 年《哆啦 A 梦：大雄的海底鬼岩城》的新版，计划 2026 年上映。

Public information shows that Tetsuo Yajima is the director and Isao Murayama is the screenwriter for this film. This is also the first remake in the Doraemon theatrical film series since 'Nobita's Little Star Wars 2021', and it is the 45th 2D animated film in the 'Doraemon' series. 公开信息显示，本片导演由矢岛哲生担当、编剧由村山功担当。这也是哆啦 A 梦剧场版电影系列自《大雄的宇宙小战争 2021》以来的首部重置作品，并且也是《哆啦 A 梦》系列 2D 动画电影的第 45 部作品。

item.title: 《迷路的公车》发布剧照
item.description:
According to Watchmen Hollywood, new stills have been released for the new film 'The Lost Bus', starring Matthew McConaughey and America Ferrera, and directed by Paul Greengrass. 据守望好莱坞消息，马修·麦康纳、亚美莉卡·费雷拉主演，保罗·格林格拉斯导演的新片《迷路的公车》发布剧照。

The film is adapted from journalist Lizzie Johnson's non-fiction book 'Paradise: One Town’s Struggle to Survive an American Wildfire', and is set against the backdrop of the 2018 California Paradise wildfire incident. 该片改编自记者莉 Lizzie Johnson 的纪实文学《Paradise: One Town’s Struggle to Survive an American Wildfire》，以 2018 年加州天堂镇野火事件为背景。

The film will be released in limited North American theaters on September 19 and will be available on Apple TV+ on October 3. 影片将于 9 月 19 日北美限定影院上映，10 月 3 日上线 Apple TV+。
